Pass5♣6Pass6♠
AP
1. Extended acceptance after NT
2. Cue bid, a ♥ stopper
3. Cue bid, a ♦ stopper
4. Cue bid, surplus
5. Blackwood 0314, for ♠
6. A=0/5 or 3/5

Dealer: S

South HCP: 15
